attributes.action: To stop shops from automatically printing paper receipts
attributes.additional_details:
[1] Boudalia S, Berges R, et al. Neurotoxicol Teratol. (2014), 41:16-26.

[2] Manfo FP, Jubendradass R, Nantia EA, Moundipa PF, Mathur PP, Rev Environ Contam Toxicol. (2014), 228:57-82
attributes.background:
Receipts are often coated with BPA which produce potentially toxic chemicals when recycled with paper, and as a result cannot be recycled. Many people don't need or want their receipts so retailers are wasting paper and money by printing receipts. 
There should be an option to print the receipt.
